alerts.content: üö® Investigation Update: The "DeFi Yield Protocol" has executed an exit scam, draining $4.2M from liquidity pools. Team wallets are moving funds through Tornado Cash. Contract: 0xabc...123. Multiple victims confirmed. Tracking wallets: [Thread continues...]

‚ö†Ô∏è SCAM ALERT: New phishing site impersonating OpenSea is ranking high on Google. Already 73 wallets drained totaling $890K. Site uses similar URL with unicode characters. Never click Google ads for crypto sites. Bookmark official URLs only.

üìä Research Thread: Tracking the recent Arbitrum bridge exploit. $2.3M stolen through reentrancy attack. Hacker wallet 0x742...abc is splitting funds across multiple chains. Previous similar attacks linked to North Korean groups. Full analysis: [1/12]
